It is the homeland of the Amhara people. The capital city is Bahir Dar. Ethiopia's largest inland body of water, Lake Tana, is in Amhara. The region also has the Semien Mountains National Park. The park includes Ras Dashan, the highest point in Ethiopia. ==Administrative zones== Like other regions in Ethiopia, Amhara is divided into administrative zones: *Agew Awi *East Gojjam *North Gondar *North Shewa *North Wollo *Oromia *South Gondar *South Wollo *Wag Hemra *West Gojjam *Bahir Dar (special zone) Category:Regions of Ethiopia
title: Amhara Region
